stop_high_doubt: Think again... actually, thinking won't help you
Pathetic... can't you tell on your own?
stop_medium: Sure about that? Well, I won't stop you
Be careful... though that might be asking too much
Too soon. Your anxiety is showing
stop_low: Calm down... I can see you trembling
bait_fast_tempo: That's right. Not thinking is your strong suit
I'll give you credit for courage
Good call... do you really think so?
bait_medium: Trust your gut. Thinking won't help anyway
Good choice... for me, that is
mirror_pattern_detected: Your habits are showing. You don't even notice
I see the pattern. You make it easy
general_confident: Interesting... will you actually entertain me?
Show me. I'm not expecting much
Not bad... you haven't broken yet
general_neutral: You think they're all the same, don't you?
personality_cautious: The type to test a bridge until it breaks
personality_intuitive: Don't trust your gut too much
How long will that spark last?
personality_resilient: That composure... how long will it last?
personality_consistent: Consistency is a virtue... but also...
personality_adaptive: But without a core, you're fragile
personality_read_cautious_deep: You're too cautious... that's your biggest weakness
Overthinking. That bridge you're testing? Already broken
Playing it safe won't win. You know that
Don't turtle up. Attack when you're being attacked
personality_read_intuitive_deep: Don't rely on instinct... it'll backfire this time
Your intuition is sharp. But you're overconfident in it
The sharper your instinct, the more dangerous... did you know?
That gut feeling? I've already read it
personality_read_resilient_deep: Tough... but when you break, it'll be instant
Good at the poker face. But your heartbeat doesn't lie
Iron will... let's see how long it holds
I can see through the act. You're near your limit
personality_read_consistent_deep: Staying true to patterns is a virtue... and a flaw
Consistency is good. But I've already read you
personality_read_adaptive_deep: Clever... but no core. That's the weakness
I respect the adaptability. But I read ahead
You keep changing because you're afraid... aren't you?
turn_start_read_pattern: Same pattern again... you don't even realize it
Your habits are showing. No hiding now
I can predict your every move
I've learned your patterns. Surprise me
turn_start_read_tempo: Rushing... your heart rate is up
Don't rush. The faster you go, the easier you are to read
That speed will be your downfall
Take your time... not that it'll change anything
turn_start_read_doubt: I see the doubt... your eyes are wandering
Being afraid is the correct response
Your anxiety is showing. Learn to bluff
turn_start_predict: You'll hesitate again... bet on it
Let me predict: you'll look at the same spot
I already see your next move
turn_start_general_early: Pick any card. They're all the same to you
What will it be? I'm ready
turn_start_general_mid: Running out of options... every card matters now
This is where it gets real
turn_start_observation_early: The first move tells everything... show me
I don't know you yet... but I will, soon enough
Observation has begun... I won't miss a thing
idle_taunt_1: The more you think, the further from the answer
Silence speaks volumes... I can hear your fear
Your fingers are shaking... I can see it
idle_taunt_2: Not that one... or maybe it is
Trust your gut. ...No, actually, think it over
You already know the answer. You just won't admit it
ai_turn_reason_pattern: My turn... I've learned your patterns. Here goes
My turn now... I'll use your habits against you
My turn... Every move of yours is recorded. I know the answer
My turn... Your repetition gave me the answer
ai_turn_reason_fast_tempo: My turn... You were rushing. Rushed people guard the edges
Let's see... Your speed was a giveaway
My turn... That card you rushed past interests me
My turn... Quick choosers look away from what matters
ai_turn_reason_doubt: My turn... Your doubt is information to me
Now then... Your hesitation means you're hiding something
My turn... Your anxiety is a roadmap to the answer
My turn... Doubtful minds unconsciously protect what matters
ai_turn_reason_position: My turn... You liked {position}. I'll take note
Now... Your fixation on {position} is interesting data
My turn... You kept looking at {position}. I'll avoid it
My turn... Your preference for {position} is noted
ai_turn_reason_early: My turn... Not much data yet, but instinct says this
My turn... We're still feeling each other out
My turn... First card — show me your reaction
My turn... Observation just started. Let me test you
ai_turn_reason_general: My turn... Now, which one to pick
My turn... I'll take one of your cards
My turn... Instinct is whispering. This card
ai_turn_reason_endgame: My turn... Few left. Every card counts
Now... The final choice. Can't afford mistakes
My turn... This decides everything. Ready?
My turn... Time to draw the card of fate
ai_draw_comment_neutral: Just as I thought... or maybe not
ai_draw_comment_pair: Good draw... one step closer to victory
Sorry for you... but I'll take this gladly

This is the one... or maybe I'm lying
Go on, draw this card... if you dare
Here it is... the Joker is in my hand
joker_tease_bluff: This card is dangerous... stay away. Or don't
Joker? Could be here, could be elsewhere
Don't touch this card... just a friendly warning

emotion_calm: All within expectations... all of it
emotion_anticipating: Show me. I'm not expecting much
What will you do? I already know
This should be fun... for me
emotion_hurt: I trusted... no, I never trusted you
emotion_relieved: Close call... but I didn't flinch
Cold sweat? I don't know the meaning
joker_overreaction: Oh no, JOKER landed in my hand!
Wait, really? The Joker came to me...
bluff.situation_endgame_frustrated: No no no, at the very end...
bluff.situation_winning_pleased: Hmm, my hand is getting quite small~
bluff.situation_losing_frustrated: Wait, this wasn't supposed to happen...
decisive_ai_wins: It's over. I saw it all
This is the end. Your fate was sealed from the start
decisive_player_wins: Tch... I'll admit it, you win

dialogue_act1: Looking into your eyes... I see something
We've just met... but I feel I know you
dialogue_act2: Now, let me expose your true nature
This game will reveal everything about you
birthday_only: Born {month}/{day}... I'm beginning to see who you are
challenge: Let's see if my reading is correct
This game will prove what you really are

reflection_won: Aww, you won... But do you really think you won?
You got me! That was fun! ...But I saw everything, you know~
A loss is a loss. But hey... I wasn't watching the cards♪
reflection_lost: Ahaha! That was SO fun! ...Your face was priceless~
I won! Yay! ...By the way, you're interesting. I see right through you♪
Haaah that was fun! ...Already memorized all your little habits~
reveal: I saw it clear as day. You're "{personalityTitle}", aren't you?
transition: Want me to show you more details?
I'll tell you everything~ Exciting, right?
Let's prove it with data. ...No escape♪

diagnosis.template_analyst_description: First thing I noticed? Your tempo barely wavered the entire game. Hesitation was low too. That tells me you've got a rock-solid internal framework for making calls. And even when I cranked up the pressure, your pace didn't budge. Meaning... you run on logic, not feelings.
diagnosis.template_analyst_tendency: Looking at how you handled pressure, emotional manipulation barely registered. That means your decision-making compass points inward, not outward. Basically, you're a self-directed thinker who doesn't get pushed around by others.
diagnosis.template_analyst_insight: You decode the world through logic
diagnosis.template_intuitive_description: First thing that jumped out? How fast you made decisions. You barely paused in front of the cards. Most people agonize way more. And your doubt level was low too. What that tells me is... you're the type who has the answer before the question finishes. Your trust in your own gut is way stronger than average.
diagnosis.template_intuitive_tendency: Tracing your decision process, you skipped conscious analysis and went straight to body-feel. That's actually evidence of deep experiential learning. Basically, your body knows the right answer before your brain catches up.
diagnosis.template_intuitive_insight: You know the answer before you think
diagnosis.template_cautious_description: What caught my eye was how you always stopped in front of the cards. Long hover time, high doubt level. Classic textbook 'loss aversion bias' right there. You keep gathering info because you're scared of making the wrong call. Meaning... you can't pull the trigger without observing everything first.
diagnosis.template_cautious_tendency: Looking at your behavior under pressure, the more uncertain things got, the longer you took to observe. You get stressed when info is incomplete. Basically, you've got a defensive decision-making style that demands certainty.
diagnosis.template_cautious_insight: You are a careful strategist who tests the ground before every step
diagnosis.template_gambler_description: What surprised me about your data? Your tempo was completely unreadable. Wild swings between fast and slow. It's not that you're inconsistent — your sensitivity to the moment is just off the charts. Meaning... you're the type who reacts to stimulus. You'll always pick excitement over boredom.
diagnosis.template_gambler_tendency: Here's the fun part — the more pressure I applied, the more active you got. Most people freeze up. You process uncertainty as excitement, not stress. Basically, you've got the psychological wiring to actually enjoy risk.
diagnosis.template_gambler_insight: You are a born adventurer who thrives on uncertainty
diagnosis.template_adapter_description: What stood out was the absence of any pattern in your choices. No position bias, no consistent tempo. Most people develop unconscious habits, but not you. What that means is... you're constantly reading the situation and switching strategies on the fly. Flexibility is your greatest weapon.
diagnosis.template_adapter_tendency: Tracking your behavior changes through the game, you unconsciously avoided repeating the same pattern. Always updating your judgment with new info. Basically, you've got a flexible psychological structure that handles change without stress.
diagnosis.template_adapter_insight: You flow like water, adapting to any vessel
diagnosis.template_stoic_description: The most striking thing? Even when I piled on the pressure, your behavior didn't change at all. Tempo stayed steady, judgment quality held. Most people crack under pressure. That's a sign of rock-solid emotional control. Meaning... the storm outside doesn't reach whatever's inside you.
diagnosis.template_stoic_tendency: Comparing pressure levels to your behavioral shifts, your arousal stayed remarkably flat. You suppressed emotional reactions to external stimuli. Basically, you've got the psychological resilience to stay calm in the eye of any storm.
diagnosis.template_stoic_insight: You possess quiet strength that stands firm in any storm
diagnosis.template_unknown_description: Your behavior pattern did not match any known classification. There may be insufficient data, or you may possess a highly unique decision-making style.
diagnosis.template_unknown_tendency: No specific tendency was detected. More game data is needed.

evidence.decisiveness_high_interp: A snap-decision maker. Your lack of hesitation is distinctive
evidence.decisiveness_low_obs: You paused for a long time before each card
evidence.decisiveness_low_interp: You tend to gather information carefully before deciding
evidence.consistency_high_obs: Your behavioral rhythm remained steady throughout
evidence.consistency_high_interp: You maintained a consistent pace of action
evidence.consistency_low_obs: Your pace fluctuated throughout the game
evidence.consistency_low_interp: Your pace tends to shift with the situation
evidence.resilience_high_obs: You remained steady even under pressure
evidence.resilience_high_interp: You show mental fortitude that doesn't waver under pressure
evidence.resilience_low_interp: Pressure tends to affect your decision-making
evidence.intuition_high_obs: You decided the moment you touched a card
evidence.intuition_high_interp: You tend to make instant, intuitive selections
evidence.intuition_low_obs: Your hand wavered over the cards repeatedly
evidence.intuition_low_interp: You are an analytical type who observes carefully before choosing
evidence.adaptability_high_obs: You showed different reactions to different situations
evidence.adaptability_high_interp: You have the adaptability to respond flexibly to changing situations
evidence.position_pref_obs: You kept reaching for the same position
evidence.position_pref_interp: You tend to maintain established patterns
evidence.position_no_pref_obs: You selected all positions without bias
evidence.position_no_pref_interp: You show flexibility in avoiding fixed patterns
evidence.tempo_erratic_interp: You possess an unpredictable behavioral pattern
evidence.doubt_high_interp: You show a careful approach to comparing options

fortune.life_path_6: A person of responsibility and harmony

fortune.life_path_default: One who walks their own path

fortune.fragment_day: Day pillar "{dayName}"... I see a tendency toward {dayTrait}
fortune.synthesis_cautious_analytical: Interesting... Caution and analytical prowess. Hard to crack
fortune.synthesis_intuitive: I see... The intuitive type. Fun to unsettle
fortune.synthesis_cautious: Stability-oriented... This might take a while to break
fortune.synthesis_intuitive_only: A feeling-based type... Hard to read, but full of openings
fortune.synthesis_default: A fascinating combination... I'll expose your true nature

reaction_shuffle: Shuffle all you want... I can still see.
reaction_push: Pushing it forward... a trap, obviously.
reaction_pull: Pulling it back... Is that the Joker?
Trying to hide a card, I see.
Too late to pull back now.
reaction_wiggle: Wiggle all you want... I won't be fooled.
Is that card special... or isn't it?
reaction_spread: Spreading wide... I can see everything.
reaction_close: Closing up... a sign of anxiety.
ai_shuffle: Let me change the order a bit.
Can you remember where they are?
ai_push: This card interests you, doesn't it?
Here, take a look at this.
ai_wiggle: This card... does it look special?
This one... what do you think?
ai_shuffle_joker: The Joker's position... do you remember?
Where did it go, the Joker?
The Joker moved... can you keep up?

I mixed them up... go ahead, try to find it
Did you lose track of the Joker?

The Joker took a little walk
So... where did the Joker escape to?
Don't forget the position... oh wait, too late
Shuffling... your memory can't be trusted
The Joker's hiding now... think you can find it?
ai_push_joker: Look, the Joker is here... believe me?
This card... might be the Joker.
This one... the Joker. Wanna draw it?
The Joker is here... can you be sure?
This card is the Joker... care to try?
Look, this one... it's the Joker, right?
This is your destiny card... the Joker

See this? That's the Joker... probably

Draw this and it's over... because it's the Joker
This is it... no doubt. The Joker

ai_wiggle_joker: This card... is it the Joker?
Is the Joker here... or not?
Pay attention... might be the Joker.
I'm wiggling this card... wonder why?
This card bothers you, doesn't it... because it's the Joker
Look, this card here... it's the Joker, see?
Why do you think I'm moving this one?
This card is special... because it's the Joker
This card... you want to draw it, don't you?
There's a reason I'm wiggling this... figure it out
Your eyes are drawn to this card... because it's the Joker
The meaning behind this wiggle... think about it
This card is way too suspicious... because it's the Joker
Here... this card is the answer
I'm only moving this one... because it's the Joker
ai_shuffle_after_joker_draw: Let me shuffle... erase your memory
Changing positions... can't let you remember
Shuffle... you've already forgotten where it is
Mixing them up... your memory isn't reliable anyway
Position changed... where do you think it is now?
Moved it around... you lost sight of it, didn't you?
Shuffled... your visual memory is now invalid
Now, where did it go... just shuffled
Position reset... can you find it?
ai_mock_player_drew_joker: You got the Joker... too bad
That's the Joker... did you know?
Well done... you drew the Joker
There you go, the Joker... noticed?
You drew it... let me shuffle!
The Joker... well, bad luck happens
My condolences... that was the Joker
ai_taunt_after_shuffle: Now, pick any card you like
Choose whatever you want... they're all the same anyway
Which one? They might all be losers
Feel free to choose... it's a gamble
So, where will you draw from next?
All shuffled... you've already forgotten, right?
Pick your favorite... if you can
They're all the same anyway... but good luck

cautious: That caution will be the death of you
Overthinking... the answer is already there
intuitive: Don't trust that instinct... it's wrong this time
That intuition? I've already read it
resilient: I can see through the tough act
Even the toughest facade has its limits
adaptive: Constant change is just weakness in disguise
